description: This file defines the NoteEditorScreen widget for editing or creating notes in a Flutter application. It contains UI components, state management, and interaction logic with a NotesProvider to persist changes.

classes.name: NoteEditorScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides an interface for creating or editing a note, with static methods for instantiation.

classes.name: _NoteEditorScreenState
classes.description: The state class managing the UI and logic for NoteEditorScreen, including initializing, saving, and disposing resources.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new instance of NoteEditorScreen without a specific note ID, for creating new notes.

methods.name: edit
methods.description: Creates an instance of NoteEditorScreen pre-filled with data for editing a specific note identified by noteId.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state; currently does nothing async, but prepares the widget for lifecycle.

methods.name: didChangeDependencies
methods.description: Loads existing note data if noteId is provided, populating the input fields accordingly.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of controllers to free resources when the widget is removed.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Handles saving the note, either by creating a new one or updating an existing one, then navigating back.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Returns the widget tree for the note editor UI, including text fields and save actions.
